name: Avid Boneyard
description: Desecrate the ground at the target location, dealing 3580 Frost Damage over 10 seconds.  Consumes a corpse on cast to deal 50% more damage.  You or an ally standing in the graveyard can activate the Grave Robber synergy, dealing 3375 Frost Damage to enemies in the area and healing for the damage done.
effectLines: You can use your own synergy.
coefDescription: Desecrate the ground at the target location, dealing $1 Frost Damage over 10 seconds.  Consumes a corpse on cast to deal 50% more damage.  You or an ally standing in the graveyard can activate the Grave Robber synergy, dealing $2 Frost Damage to enemies in the area and healing for the damage done.
